Class MultiString

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.MultiString
public class MultiString extends Object
MULTI String (MarkUp Language for Transportation Information), as specified in NTCIP 1203.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter, Travis Swanston, John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting, Gordon Parikh - SRF Consulting

    Create a new MULTI string.

    • MultiString

      public MultiString(String m)
      Create a new MULTI string.
      Parameters:
      m - MULTI string, may not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if m is null.

      public void parse(Multi cb)
      Parse the MULTI string.
      Parameters:
      cb - A callback which keeps track of the MULTI state.

    • isBlank

      public boolean isBlank()
      Is the MULTI string blank?

    • normalize

      public MultiString normalize()
      Normalize a MULTI string.
      Returns:
      A normalized MULTI string with invalid characters and invalid tags removed.

    • normalizeLocator

      public MultiString normalizeLocator()
      Normalize an incident locator MULTI string

      public MultiString normalizeLine()
      Normalize (and trim) a single line MULTI string

      Strip font tags from a MULTI string

      Strip all page time tags from a MULTI string

      public String trailingTextRectangle()
      Check for (and return) trailing text rectangle tag

    • combiningSharedTextRectangle

      public String combiningSharedTextRectangle()
      Get "combining shared" text rectangle (if any)

    • replacePageTime

      public String replacePageTime(Integer pt_on, Integer pt_off)
      Replace all the page times in a MULTI string. If no page time tag exists, then a page time tag is prepended.
      Parameters:
      pt_on - Page on-time in tenths of a second.
      pt_off - Page off-time in tenths of a second.
      Returns:
      The updated MULTI string.

    • singlePage

      public boolean singlePage()
      Return a value indicating if the message is single or multi-page.
      Returns:
      True if the message contains a single page else false for multi-page.

    • getNumPages

      public int getNumPages()
      Get the number of pages in the multistring

    • getFonts

      public int[] getFonts(int f_num)
      Get an array of font numbers.
      Parameters:
      f_num - Default font number, one based.
      Returns:
      An array of font numbers for each page of the message.

    • pageOnInterval

      public Interval pageOnInterval()
      Get the page-on interval for the 1st page. If no page-on is specified in the MULTI string, the default is returned.
      Returns:
      The page-on interval.

    • pageOnIntervals

      public Interval[] pageOnIntervals(Interval dflt)
      Get an array of page-on time intervals.
      Parameters:
      dflt - Default page-on time.
      Returns:
      An array of page-on time Intervals, one value per page.

    • pageOffInterval

      public Interval pageOffInterval()
      Get the page-off interval for the 1st page. If no page-off is specified in the MULTI string, the default is returned.
      Returns:
      The page-off interval.

    • pageOffIntervals

      public Interval[] pageOffIntervals(Interval dflt)
      Get an array of page-off time intervals.
      Parameters:
      dflt - Default page-off time.
      Returns:
      An array of page-off time Intervals, one value per page.

    • getPage

      public String getPage(int p)
      Get MULTI string for specified page

    • asText

      public String asText()
      Get a MULTI string as text only (tags stripped)

    • getWords

      public List<String> getWords()
      Get the words in the message as a list.
      Returns:
      A list containing each trimmed word in the message.
